data.title: Admin Bio Preview
data.meta_description: World's #1 platform to monetize your Facebook group, engage members and get deep insights into what is working in your community.
data.text:
I am Pooja Sharma â€¦awarded as top 100 creator of India 2023 by the governor of uttrakhand & community champion 2023 .. I am admin of 7 active Facebook groups of 5 lakh members along with my co admin Preeti Mughlani .. I started group Parenting with food and fitness in July 2016 as I wanted to connect with people and also wanted that every woman should take out time for herself in form of group participation..

Later I created She (women empowering group) Mommies & Babies , beauty with gadgets , Tom - television ott and movies , Mothers love , Bachpan ki Yaadein â€¦All these groups are like my babies ðŸ‘¶ canâ€™t live without them .

I am an entrepreneur running my firm Cryatif Designing since 15 years .I have a master degree in management , interior design ,law and education ..

As a community leader I had independently ran many brand promotion compaigns in more than 100 fb communities comprising of 35 lakh members ..

GROUP VISION - I am passionate about running my Facebook groups , insta & watsapp group .. and approximately give 8 hours to groups daily .We conducted more than 100 online /offline awareness programmes includes pcos, parenting tips, dental care, jhatphat reciepes , child care , cervical cancer , kids immunisation etc .

Brands we worked with -Our groups completed 400 plus National & International brand compaigns successfully in last 1 year like Dyson corrale, dyson airwrap , Amazon , Wella, Phillips, Pediasure, nangrow , Dyson v11 absolute pro, Charlie Banana , Danone , mccain , itc , milkmaid , Asian paints , yippee noodles , nestle etc All compaigns had organic engagement ranging between 200-1000 per group .

Group Social cause-We want to empower women with little we can so Till date 500+ group members have successfully completed professional certificate courses without paying any fees . Dreams are bigger hope will be able to achieve soon ..

ABOUT GROUPS-

PARENTING WITH FOOD & FITNESS- This group I started for all Parents who love food & fitness in July 2016â€¦Here all food lovers freely share their food ideas & receipes. Members takes beauty, parenting & health tips from this group with full faith ..it have 159kmembers

She- She is the women group which I started in July 2020 ..itâ€™s a voice of every woman who is a mother , daughter.. we discuss here all women concerned topics like beauty , lifestyle , fashion & kids. It have 10.8k highly engaged members

Mommies & Babies- This group is all for mommies and babies .. Their likings ,dislikings ,hobbies , talents .. here we conduct contests for kids 0-14 years and try to get out best among the kids ..it have 3800 members

Mothers love - A group dedicated to mothers â€¦ having 36.3k members

Bachpan ki Yaadei - group dedicated to childhood .. having 17.9k members

Brands we would like to collaborate with - parenting, beauty , lifestyle , health , kids and electronics.. we would also like to collaborate if you are looking for a large scale brand promotion â€¦
